column1: and he strikes first ball! Perfect start for Rising Pune. Possibly an offcutter outside off, Guptill throws his hands at the ball. He flat-bats it in the air, and Tiwary leaps and takes it over his head at short cover. Good catch
good length and angling away outside off, Marsh presses forward and dabs it to cover
full and outside off, Marsh presses forward and defends to the off side again
shortens his length outside off, angling away, Marsh opens the face and steers the ball straight to point

another slower ball outside off, 14ks slower than the previous ball. Sticks in the surface, Marsh does not pick the change up. Drives early and spoons it to the left of a diving Tiwary at short covers
seam-up. Short of a length and skids on off stump, 137ks, cramps the left-hander for room. Marsh eyes up the leg side but ends up fending it back down the pitch
full and outside off, opens the face and helps the ball down to third man
straying on the hips, Thakur gets away as Marsh glances straight to Unadkat at short fine
loose half-volley on the pads, Thakur can't get away despite finding some inswing. Flicked away in the gap between midwicket and mid-on
dug in short and outside off, jumps off his feet and fends it to cover
hint of width outside off, Marsh simply loves width, leans back and late cuts a single down to third man
just short of a good length and on off, 141ks, Saha hastily chops to deep third man

edged and dropped by Dhoni diving to his right. Reluctant dive. He has always been reluctant to dive. Bursts out of the right glove. Dhoni was late to react. Full and angling away outside off - seam-up - Saha reaches out with hard hands for a drive and nicks it. Dhoni can't cling on. Christian at wide slip - almost second slip - had no chance to take it on the rebound either. How much will this repirve cost Pune?
really full on the pads, right there for the flick, but Marsh does not connect
slower offcutter, ends up on Saha's pads, he picks it up and flicks it in the air over square leg. The ball swirls over the boundary
Saha shows intent, again. Dashes down the track, another slower ball from the left-armer. Saha swings early.... and only connects with thin air
slower offcutter again, grips and bounces, hits Saha high on the bat
short of a length and angling across off, stabbed away towards point
slightly overpitched and outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
look at that bounce! Back of a length and zips outside off, 140ks, rises over Marsh's attempted cut

Marsh dares to hit on the up and holes out to Smith running to his left from mid-off. Good length cross-seamer, just outside off, this is  not the kind of pitch to be hitting on the up. Marsh drives uppishly and perishes
nip-backer from, length ball, Morgan would have been in trouble had he not inside-edged it onto his thigh
width, and Marsh frees his arms. Flat-batted away past backward point, third man isn't square enough to stop the ball
shortens his length on off, defended
tight line on off, good length, defended into the covers
good length and outside off, Saha runs it away to third man

Unadkat swoops down on the ball at mid-on, and splatters the stumps at the non-striker's end. Excellent throw, catches Morgan short! Very full and angled in on leg stump, Morgan pushes it in front of mid-on and sets off to pinch a quick single. Unadkat intervenes, dives forward, collects and throws the stumps down. Bam. He does not bang his head against the turf for a change
full and outside off, dabbed away to the right of deep third man
back of a length and angled in, worked to square leg
slightly overpitched and outside off, Tewatia flat-bats it powerfully through the covers. Whistles away to the boundary
leg-side wide
length on off, chopped away to deep third man

It's that man: Unadkat, again! He dives full-length to his left from short fine leg and takes it with both hands. Tewatia's promition has backfired. Another cross-seamer. Another one that bounces on leg stump. Cramps the batsman for room who attempts to flick but instead lobs a catch to Unadkat at 45
another leg-side wide
140ks, short of a length and outside off, stands up tall and punches to Tiwary at short cover
shortish and outside off, chops it straight to point

Kings XI five down inside the first six overs! Leg-stump half-volley, Maxwell flicks it stylishly, but does not bother to keep it down. He times it and watches the ball drop into the hands of Rahane at deep square leg. That is the definition of a dolly catch
full and outside off, left alone
back of a length and bounces outside off, slashes and misses
back of a length and outside off, moisture in the surface, sticky, Axar checks his punch and plays to point
full on off, another one that holds up, Axar checks his drive and chips the ball in front of mid-on
just short of a good length on off, forced back to Stokes
too wide outside off, left alone
full and on off, stops on Axar again, defended right back to him
back of a length and bounces outside off, Axar does not really meet the pitch. Reaches out with hard hands and sends an outside edge down to third man
edged in the gap between Dhoni and Christian at wide slip. Dhoni doesn't dive.  Full and wide outside off, reaches out for a drive and sends a thick edge between the two fielders
shortish and outside off, dabbed to point
bouncer on the leg stump, flies through to Dhoni as Axar carefully ducks under it
hip-high short ball on off, sits back and knocks it through the square-leg region
full on off, opens the face and pushes the ball to point
pitched up outside off, crisp front-foot drive, but straight to short cover
low full-toss outside off, driven to the right of Stokes at long-off
half-tracker just outside off, Axar picks it early. Goes deep in the crease and pulls it strongly to clear the wide long-on boundary
very full on the leg stump, low full-toss, whipped to deep midwicket
short, slider on off, Saha hastily pulls and ends up dragging it to long-on. Could not adjust to the hike in pace
tossed-up legbreak, spins in, pushed down to long-on on the front foot. Fifty up for Kings XI
Saha runs down the track, this is fired on off. He yorks himself but manages to dig it out. Time for a time-out
short and wide outside off, carved away to the right of backward point to deep third man

Dhoni dives to his right, and takes it now! These cross seamers are working for Rising Pune on this track. Full and outside off, Saha pushes away from the body and nicks it behind. Dhoni and Christian clean up the mess themselves
back of a length and outside off, guided to third man
shortish and outside off, flat-bats a cut to sweeper
short and wide outside off, smeared away to cover point
short and wide outside off, carved away in the air. Tripathi runs to his left from sweeper and cuts it off
low full-toss on off, driven down to long-on
another low full-toss on off, punched down to long-off
sliding away outside off from over the wicket, guided to Unadkat at short third man
flatter wrong'un, starts outside off and spins back in, Swapnil goes hard for a drive and keeps it out
fuller than a good length and outside off, played to point
non-turning legbreak outside off, driven through the line to long-off
full on off, cross seamer, opens the face and guides it to deep point
banged in short on middle, tip-and-run single to point

Nicked behind. Dhoni doesn't need to dive this time. Good length and angling away wide outside off from over the wicket. Axar follows the ball, as does Dhoni behind the stumps, completing an easy waist-high grab. Christian and Dhoni make amends again
full and outside off, presses forward, opens the face and drives through the covers
back of a length on off, opens the face and steers it to point
length ball on off, stops on the batsman. He is stuck to the crease as he aims to work to leg. Gets a soft leading edge in front of cover
floated up on middle, the batsman stays leg side of the ball and blocks to cover
near yorker on off, jabbed away to deep point
low full-toss on off, bunted down to long-on
hip-high short ball on off, swatted on the back foot to deep midwicket
nurdled through midwicket
very full and outside off, driven down to long-off
length and angling across off, played to point
back of a length and angling away outside off, Swapnil can't get it past Stokes at point
slower offcutter, grips and bounces, defended with soft hands to point

Christian and Dhoni at it again. Christian at slip can't close his hands around this nick. It was flying towards his head. Dhoni grabs it on the rebound. Kings XI eight down. Short and angling away wide outside off, Swapnil throws his hands at the ball and bottom-edges it behind
short of a length and angling across off, left alone
left alone outside off. Wicket-maiden for Unadkat
full and wide outside off, swings and misses
full and angled in on off, poked to short midwicket
good length and skids on just outside off, past the outside edge, another cross seamer
hip-high short ball on leg stump, deflected square through the leg side
back of a length on off, punched back to Stokes
full and wide outside off, reaches out with his hands and slices an outside edge that runs to third man

Smith runs in from cover and snaffles it. This was the legbreak, turning away outside off. Ishant looks to slog at it against the turn, across the line. He only manages to toe-end it in the air. It balloons into the hands of the Pune captain
tossed-up legbreak outside off, uses his feet and drives it with the break over cover
another length-ball legbreak, rips past the outside edge
slider on middle, the batsman stays leg side of the ball and defends
Christian grabs it at long-off, Kings XI fall to 73 all out. Looped up on off stump, Mohit comes down the track for a loft. He gets more height as opposed to distance, and finds the man in the deep
full outside off, outswinger, Rahane drives with his feet nowhere close to the pitch. An inside edge rolls to midwicket
pitched up and outside off, solid stride, gets close to the pitch and drives in the gap at cover
full and outside off, no lateral movement, presses forward and dabs to cover
good length and outside of, dropped defensively to point again
slightly overpitched and outside off, Rahane leans into a drive and times it well but can't beat cover
Rahane reaches out for a drive wide outside off, slices a single to deep third man
full and outside off, run down to third man
back of a length, skids on top of off, jabbed to slip
Tripathi runs down the track again. Takes a back-of-a-length ball from outside off and flat-bats it with great authority through cover
full and nibbles in on off, pushed back
really full on off, shovelled with the bottom hand but straight to mid-on
hip-high short ball on leg stump, possibly a slower one, swatted to long leg
Tripathi shimmies out again, Sandeep drifts it down leg, wide
back of a length on off, pushed down to mid-on
Rahane now uses his feet, the line is too straight, flicked to mid-on
shot. Races down the track, Sandeep looks to cramp the moving batsman with a short ball on leg stump. Tripathi still swatted it to the midwicket boundary
backs away outside leg and punches a single to extra cover
back of a length and outside off, punched to mid-off
clipped from off stump to deep square leg
short and wide outside off, slashed away to third man
short and wide outside off, flat-batted away, third man isn't square enough to stop the ball. Tripathi just pounced on the width
Tripath dares to use his feet again, this is dragged short and outside off, 141ks, Tripathi has a big whoosh and does not connect
bad ball, with fine leg inside the circle. Full on leg stump, glanced away fine on its way
rises on top of a short ball outside off and steers it past backward point
short and wide outside off, flayed away to the right of Swapnil at deep third man
slider on middle, 90ks, defended back
skids on off, chopped from there to cover point
tossed up slower on middle, Tripathi gets under it and launches it over midwicket. Goes low and unleashes a slog sweep
short and wide outside off, chopped away, can't beat the off-side infield
flat length delivery on off, stabbed back to the bowler
short legbreak outside off, flashes a cut to cover point on the back foot
slightly short and outside off, Rahane jumps back and punches to the right of a diving point
shorter and outside off, forced down to long-on
bowled 'em. Tripathi pre-meditated, shuffled outside the line, and exposed all three stumps. Tripathi can't get any bat on the sweep. Axar hits top of off with a flat, straight ball
arm ball, Smith hangs back and works to square leg
dragged short and outside off, forced to mid-on
hip-high ball on off, does not come on, Rahane pulls to deep midwicket. Not middled
flat on the pads, Rahane hangs back and nurdles it through the gap at square leg
slower on middle and leg, deflected fine on the leg side
worked with the angle through midwicket
speared flat on off, Rahane goes back and punches to deep midwicket coming in
full, hint of turn away, driven through the line but straight to cover
back of a length on off, hit to deep midwicket again
short and spins outside off, punched square to deep point
skiddy ball, turns away, Rahane can only chop a single to cover point
back of a length on off, punched firmly to long-on
full on the stumps, pushed to long-on
punched with the angle to deep midwicket
slower through the air, angled in on leg stump, knocked through square leg on the back foot
looks like a googly, short, finishes on middle, punched back
Dropped by Guptill at deep midwicket. He was on the move while attempting the catch. Floated up outside off, Rahane slog-sweeps it in the air, against the turn, and across the line, and gets away
full on the stumps, driven to long-on
short and outside off, turns away, punched to cover
short and wide outside off, cut away with the turn to the left of sweeper
opens the face and punches it crisply through point
flat on middle and leg, pushed to long-on
full and outside off, bunted to the right of Maxi
fired outside off, whipped in the direction of deep midwicket
opens the face and guides it to point
fractionally short and outside off, Rahane picks the length up early, stepping back and pulling to long-on
short and outside off again, shovel-pulled away to wide long-on
slider on middle and leg, glanced away fine of long leg
flicked from off stump to midwicket
back of a length on off, punched down to long-on
short and skids on outside off, back-foot force to long-on
full outside off, pushed to point
googly? Drifts in, inside-edged onto the pad
short on off, calmly punched down to long-on
Rahane backs away outside leg, Maxwell chases him, Rahane gets it through backward point
short and outside off, swatted on the back foot to long-on
slider on off, Smith eases a single down to long-on
Rahane feigns to move outside leg, this is fired on middle and leg, defended

Rahane finishes it with a six! Rising Pune finish second. Tossed-up offbreak on middle, uses his feet and lofts it in the air to the left of midwicket, who had been whisked in. It's all over for Kings XI Punjab
